title: WCAS SPANISH 199-0-24 Language in Context: Contemporary Spain
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introduction to the culture and politics of contemporary Spain in the basis for review and further development of some of the most problematic grammatical patterns in Spanish.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: 121-3, 125-0, AP score of 4 on the Spanish Language and/or Literature, or departmental placement exam

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Elena Lanza e-lanza@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
